execution_plan.description: Retrieve non-null emails and identifying info for all customers in the EU system.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id AS eu_id, email, full_name AS eu_full_name, country AS eu_country FROM customers WHERE email IS NOT NULL;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve matching customers from the US system whose email is present in the EU result set.
execution_plan.query: SELECT id AS us_id, email, full_name AS us_full_name, country AS us_country FROM customers WHERE email IN ($step1.email) AND email IS NOT NULL;
